title: Apple Found Guilty of Using University of Wisconsin Patent in Its Chips
text:
Apple Found Guilty of Using University of Wisconsin Patent in Its Chips 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Apple has been found guilty of using a technology, patented by the University of Wisconsin-Madison way back in 1998, in its chips without th...
